column4: Okay, so I had to boot into winxp to get the CDROM working again, to burn an install CD.  How can I get the ISO from the linux partition, so I don't have to download it again?
why don't you just burn it from under linux?
See the first phrase in my comment, the part that ended in "to get the CDROM working again".
LVM is awesome... I wrote a wiki entry about it: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lvm
